summary: Provides a mock implementation of the Amazon Comprehend service, handling entity recognizer resources, performing text analysis operations such as key‑phrase extraction, personal data (PII) detection, and sentiment evaluation, and supporting resource tagging within a test environment.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that rely on Amazon Comprehend APIs without contacting the real AWS service, by offering a fully functional in‑memory backend that mimics Comprehend behavior.
